title: Random Icon gift from riot

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Not sure why, but oh well. Thank you!
Was just curious if anyone else has gotten one these.
Sorry for picture quality.

replies.body: It's because you were honorable during the old honor system.  We're distributing different icons for participating in the old system, [see here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/old-honor-rewards)!
